Changes.LogName: Sebastian dialog updates - Robin & Demetrius drifting apart

Entries.Mon2: {{Random: Demetrius has been working a lot lately. It's nice that it's more quiet around here., I've noticed Demetrius has been putting in some crazy hours lately.#$b#I guess he's trying to get ahead., Mom's been asking if I've seen Demetrius. As if I leave the basement enough to notice., Demetrius has been putting in a lot of long hours. Mom seems to care but I barely notice., Demetrius used to bug me about getting out of my room more to spend time with the family.#$b#Now he's the one working all the time and is never around., Mom's cranky about Demetrius working so much. I just appreciate the peace and quiet., I actually had a conversation with Demetrius yesterday.#$b#Feels like a rare achievement these days.}}

Mom seems to care but I barely notice., Demetrius used to bug me about getting out of my room more to spend time with the family.#$b#Now he's the one working all the time and is never around., Mom's cranky about Demetrius working so much. I just appreciate the peace and quiet., I actually had a conversation with Demetrius yesterday.#$b#Feels like a rare achievement these days.}}

Changes.LogName: Sebastian dialog updates - Robin & Demetrius split

Entries.dating_Robin_memory_oneday: It’s funny. I used to picture you and me... Well, never mind. I see now that you and Mom are a perfect match.
Entries.married_Robin: So now I have another stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.^So now I have a stepmom and a stepdad, huh? That's going to take some getting used to.
Entries.Mon2: {{Random: Mom moving into Maru's room didn't change much for me. I'm still doing my own thing., Mom and Demetrius finally separated.#$b#I guess this was inevitable., So... Mom & Demetrius separated. Plot twist: they're both still in the house.#$b#Mom's in Maru's room and Demetrius is still here.#$b#I just stay down here pretending this is all totally normal., Mom's bunking in Maru's room now.#$b#Guess the family tree's getting a pruning., The whole thing with Mom and Demetrius splitting feels awkward.#$b#As long as they leave me alone I'm good., So... Mom moved into Maru's room.#$b#It's like we're all here but not really together. You know?, Mom's staying in Maru's room now...#$b#It's kind of weird so I just stay out of the way.}}
Entries.Mon6: {{Random: Mom moving into Maru's room didn't change much for me. I'm still doing my own thing., Mom and Demetrius finally separated.#$b#I guess this was inevitable., So... Mom & Demetrius separated. Mom moved into Maru's room.#$b#It's like we're all here but not really together. You know?, Mom's staying in Maru's room now...#$b#It's kind of weird so I just stay out of the way.}}
